mapper.select: /* 메뉴 조회 */ SELECT LPAD(' ', 2 * (MENU_DEPTH) - 1) || MENU_NM AS MENU_NM , MENU_SN , MENU_DEPTH , MENU_UP_SN , MENU_SORT , USE_YN FROM KB_MENU_INFO START WITH MENU_UP_SN IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SN = MENU_UP_SN ORDER BY MENU_SN, MENU_SORT

/* 메뉴 공통 조회 */ SELECT LPAD(' ', 2 * (MENU_DEPTH) - 1) || MENU_NM AS MENU_NM , MENU_SN , MENU_DEPTH , MENU_UP_SN , MENU_SORT , MENU_LINK FROM KB_MENU_INFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH MENU_UP_SN IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_SN = MENU_UP_SN ORDER BY MENU_SN, MENU_SORT
SELECT MENU_NM , USE_YN FROM KB_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_SN = #{menu_sn}
